review_data.title: Indian food @ Zurich
review_data.content: we had visited Malabar twice so far. Their veggie starter platter is a perfect one to order as appetizer. The carrot pakoda part of this starter really taste great. The overall food quality is really nice. However, the ambience is average.

review_data.title: Good Indian restaurant in Oerlikon
review_data.content: We had a good dinner at Malabar restaurant. Particularly the Biryanies were good, although I recommend ordering some curry with it to give it some moisture. The service was fine but prices are a bit high.

review_data.title: Great service
review_data.content: In a town not known for good service, this is a gem in that respect. The food is excellent and it is not overly spicy. Good spot to go to!!!

review_data.title: Very nice Indian food
review_data.content: Food was full of flavor even if it was not very spicy. We went for lunch when they had a buffet. Not much variety but what was there was nice

review_data.title: Delightful

review_data.title: Very good Indian food in Oerlikon, limited choices though
review_data.content: Good food especially the tandoori dishes, also very good service, small-ish portions, small menu variety. Definitely worth visiting if in the area and looking for spicy food.

review_data.title: Lunch @ Malabar
review_data.content: Every few weeks, I meet with a group of friends at the Restaurant Malabar in Oerlikon. My favourite Indian Restaurant in the Zürich region. Wonderful food from southern India, the lunch Buffet is always a treat. And the very friendly staff and owner always make...More

review_data.title: Excellent Indian food

review_data.title: Great South Indian food
review_data.content: Authentic as they come. Finally a good South-Indian / Kerala restaurant in Zurich. We had the Thali which was really excellent and allowed us to sample different indian flavors. Typical Zurich prices but I would definitely recommend this restaurant.
